page.title: 14CURRIE MY BIRTHDAY
page.content: It was about 7.42 am when I got up. Quickly I ran downstairs and opened all my presents. There was a cassette recorder which I really wanted, a spiral pad, magic pens and Â£15. After school I had a birthday tea. I invited my two friends, Frances and Kerry. Kerry gave me a writing set and a pen and Frances gave me a Ghostbusters record and a packet of Smurf transfers. We then went to the Wimpy Bar which is in Princes Sreet. It is very big. There you can buy hamburgers. rolls,chips, soft drinks, teas, coffees and milk shakes. We all had a great time. Then we went home. When it was time to go home Frances and Kerry each got a goodie bag filled with sweets.
